description:
Works well, as intended
GTX 1060 via HDMI with propietary drivers

i'm color blind, the color saturation helps me about different color, i'm using laptop with 2 graphics card - Intel for the Monitor Laptop and Nvidia for external monitor, it's complicated to find a intel software for change the color saturation... 

And your software/Package gave me what i want to see in my monitor, thanks for everything and good luck if you code others packages / Software
